pastVacations.thoughts: I love New Orleans most of the year outside of July and August which are too hot and muggy, but March can be a little cold and rainy.
The weather is always delightful during summer in Amsterdam.
The U.P. is a great place to escape the stifling heat of summer. Great beaches and almost always a breeze.
Perfect time to see flowers blooming and have temperate weather.
It's cold, but the holiday lights make it worth it!
The weather is lovely in spring and if you go at the end of March or beginning of April, the cherry blossoms are at peak.
Perfect! The ocean is freezing all year round, but the weather is perfect.
